name: Usual John
description: Usual John is a retro action shooter, in the style of old dandy games and NES.The game contains several different locations and many kinds of enemies, each has its own abilities and characteristics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
